ch.grengine.source

Class DefaultTextSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.grengine.source.BaseSource
      • ch.grengine.source.DefaultTextSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source, TextSource

    public class DefaultTextSource
extends BaseSource
implements TextSource
    Text-based script source, default implementation of the TextSource interface.

    The source ID is "/groovy/script/Script<text-hash>" resp. "/groovy/script/<text-hash>/<desired-class-name>".

    The text hash is calculated as follows:

    • UTF-8 encode the script text to bytes
    • calculate the MD5 hash
    • convert the resulting bytes to a hex string

    The method BaseSource.getLastModified() always returns 0.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alain Stalder, Made in Switzerland.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultTextSource

        public DefaultTextSource(String text)
        constructor from script text.

        If the script text does not explicitly declare a class, the name of the compiled script class will normally be "Script<text-hash>".

        Parameters:
        text - script text
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if text is null
        Since:
        1.0

      • DefaultTextSource

        public DefaultTextSource(String text,
                         String desiredClassName)
        constructor from script text and desired class name.

        If the script text does not explicitly declare a class, the name of the compiled script class will normally be the given desired class name.

        Parameters:
        text - script text
        desiredClassName - desired class name
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if text or desired class name is null
        Since:
        1.0
